ext_onboarding_description_consent_warn_.message: To prevent malicious websites from causing you harm, $EXTENSION_NAME$ scans the addresses of websites you visit to check if they are known to be harmful. The addresses (URLs) are made non-identifiable and handled by our automated Security Cloud in accordance with our $PRIVACY_POLICY$.
Consent needed to protect your browsing
